name: Space Revival
description:
THE WEB VERSION IS A LITTLE BIT GLITCHY, I SUGGEST DOWNLOADING IT.

Controls:
W/D - up/down
SPACE - shoot
M - mute music

Collect the stars, avoid asteroids.
Shoot asteroids with SPACE, when destroyed they turn into a star.

When you hit an asteroid you have to bail out your ship by hitting the correct key when it turns red, which will lower the water.

If you lower the water enough, you can continue flying (keep your current score)

Made the the GDN Dragon Jam.

Thanks for playing! Please leave a comment on what you think!
